message: I think this is a fair split, considering the inflation that will occur in later rounds.  Let's get this done quickly!
I'm proposing a more even split. We have 12 rounds, and we'll both lose money with each round.  Let's work together to get a fair deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but this is still a much fairer split than your previous offer.  Let's reach an agreement before we both lose too much to inflation.
